document_data.caption: A map showing the Thornwash flowing south to the Lake of Steam.
document_data.name: Thornwash
document_data.region: The [[Vilhon Reach]], the [[Lake of Steam region]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thornwash''', also called the '''Thornwash River''', was a small river located in the [[Vilhon Reach]] and [[Lake of Steam region]].
document_data.Geography: The Thornwash originated in the western branch of the [[Cloven Mountains]] as well as in the heart of the [[Winterwood]]. It flowed south for approximately {{SI|150|mi|k}} before emptying into the [[Lake of Steam]].
